Class DAOProvider

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.DAOProvider
public class DAOProvider extends Object
Provides access to all DAO (Data Access Object) instances used in the application. Each DAO is instantiated with a shared DatabaseManager instance.

This class acts as a centralized factory for DAO objects, promoting easy management and consistency across data access layers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DAOProvider()
    Constructs a DAOProvider and initializes all DAO instances using a singleton DatabaseManager.
